definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 1 s. [[נׇשִׁ֫יתִי]] Je 15:10; 3 pl. [[נׇשׁוּ]] v:Je 15:10; Pt. [[נשֶׁה]] Ex 22:24 + 4 t.; pl. [[נשִׁים]] Ne 5:10, Ne 5:11 + v:Ne 5:7 Qr (Kt [[נשְׁאִים]], v. I. [[נשׁא]]), sf. [[נוֹשַׁי]] Is 50:1; —lend, usu. c. [[ב]] pers.: [[לאׁ־נׇשִׁיתִי וְלאׁ־נׇשׁוּ־בִי]] Je 15:10 I have not lent, and they have not lent to me, De 24:11, Ne 5:7 (Qr; + acc. cogn.), v:Ne 5:10, v:Ne 5:11 (both + acc. rei); pt. as subst. creditor, usurer Ex 22:24 (E), 2Ki 4:1, Is 24:2, Is 50:1, Ps 109:11.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יַשֶּׁה בְּ]] De 15:2 who lendeth to his neighbour; 2 ms. [[תַּשֶּׁה בְּ]] De 24:10 when thou lendest to thy neighbour (+ acc. cogn.).
